CustomField.formula: AND( Charket__UnreadRollupCount__c > 0, AND( OR( ISBLANK(Charket__EmailNotifiedTime__c), Charket__LastFollowerMessageTime__c > Charket__EmailNotifiedTime__c ), Charket__WeChatAgent__r.Charket__IsEmailNotificationsEnabled__c ), OR( OR( ISBLANK(Charket__WeChatAgent__r.Charket__DNDEndTime__c), ISBLANK(Charket__WeChatAgent__r.Charket__DNDStartTime__c), !Charket__WeChatAgent__r.Charket__IsDoNotDisturbEnabled__c ), IF( AND(Charket__WeChatAgent__r.Charket__DNDEndTime__c != null, Charket__WeChatAgent__r.Charket__DNDEndTime__c != null), IF( VALUE(LEFT( Charket__WeChatAgent__r.Charket__DNDEndTime__c , 2) + '.' + RIGHT( Charket__WeChatAgent__r.Charket__DNDEndTime__c , 2)) > VALUE(LEFT( Charket__WeChatAgent__r.Charket__DNDStartTime__c , 2) + '.' + RIGHT( Charket__WeChatAgent__r.Charket__DNDStartTime__c , 2)) , OR( VALUE(MID(TEXT(NOW()), 12,2) + '.' + MID(TEXT(NOW()), 15,2)) < VALUE(LEFT( Charket__WeChatAgent__r.Charket__DNDStartTime__c , 2) + '.' + RIGHT( Charket__WeChatAgent__r.Charket__DNDStartTime__c , 2)), VALUE(MID(TEXT(NOW()), 12,2) + '.' + MID(TEXT(NOW()), 15,2)) > VALUE(LEFT( Charket__WeChatAgent__r.Charket__DNDEndTime__c , 2) + '.' + RIGHT( Charket__WeChatAgent__r.Charket__DNDEndTime__c , 2)) ), OR( VALUE(MID(TEXT(NOW()), 12,2) + '.' + MID(TEXT(NOW()), 15,2)) < VALUE(LEFT( Charket__WeChatAgent__r.Charket__DNDStartTime__c , 2) + '.' + RIGHT( Charket__WeChatAgent__r.Charket__DNDStartTime__c , 2)), VALUE(MID(TEXT(NOW()), 12,2) + '.' + MID(TEXT(NOW()), 15,2)) > (VALUE(LEFT( Charket__WeChatAgent__r.Charket__DNDEndTime__c , 2) + '.' + RIGHT( Charket__WeChatAgent__r.Charket__DNDEndTime__c , 2)) + 1) ) ), true ) ) )
CustomField.label: Has Email Notified Messages
